sentence.Network_en: His paper would then engross his thoughts.
sentence.Network_cn: 然后,他就会埋头看报了.

sentence.Network_en: Gentlemen pay her attention , and engross her all to themselves.
sentence.Network_cn: 先生们对她百般奉承,把她弄得神魂颠倒.

sentence.Network_en: I'd go into bookshops and engross myself in diet books - and cookbooks.
sentence.Network_cn: 我走进书店,聚精会神地读关于饮食的书 -- 以及食谱.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (formerly also as ingross): based on en-, in- 'in' + late Latin grossus 'large'

sentences.sentence: "Her interest in butterflies absorbs her completely"

auth_sentence.content: It expects, as I may say, to engross the writer's whole self.

sentences.en: He seemed completely engrossed in his book.
sentences.cn: 他好像完全被他的那本书迷住了。
